description: Make your own irresistable condiment with this classic basil pesto recipe. Perfect for pasta and salad dressings, or as a thoughtful homemade Christmas gift.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Peanut free
name: Easy Basic Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup finely grated parmesan, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place basil, parsley, garlic and parmesan in a food processor and process until mixture is a chunky consistency. Season well, then add oil and process until combined.
Store in a sterilised glass jar or an airtight container in the fridge for up to one week or freeze in ice cube trays for up to six months.
